## Themes- Whatare they?

Ire a predefined set of style layers of *CSS code* that controls and modifies
how HTML elements are presented. 



## YAML example

```yaml
---
title: Nineteen Years Later
author: Harry Potter
date: July 31, 2016
output:
  rmarkdown::html_document:
    theme: lumen
---
```
